analysis.Summary: Vue 3 presentational component that receives a map of voting options to vote counts and renders them in a simple list under a 'Voting Results' heading.
analysis.Purpose: Display the outcome of a vote in the UI by listing each option alongside its vote tally.

Components.name: VotingResult
Components.responsibility: Render a header and an unordered list of voting options with their corresponding vote counts.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare and type-check the `results` prop passed into the component.

analysis.Usage: Imported into parent components or views with `import VotingResult from '.../VotingResult.vue'` and used in template as `<VotingResult :results="myResultsObject" />`.
analysis.Notes:
• Uses the `<script setup>` syntax introduced in Vue 3 Composition API.  
• No dedicated style block—styling must be provided globally or via parent.  
• Expects `results` to be a simple object where keys are option names and values are numeric vote counts.
